籤詩版本二:
ʻO ka wai anuanu a me ka sopa e paila ʻole ʻia, ʻaʻole anu ʻaʻole wela akā ʻoluʻolu
ʻAʻohe hana ʻē aʻe ma ka honua, e ikaika i nā ʻano hana like ʻole
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram o ka hoʻohana maikaʻi ʻana i nā mea.
Paʻa a maikaʻi nā mea a pau.
解曰: Ua kala ʻia nā pio. Ua halawai kekahi ma'i me ke kauka maikai. E ʻimi i ka waiwai a me ka manaʻolana. Na kuhikuhi hanohano.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hoʻopakele ʻo Lintong
Moʻokūʻauhau Sui hope. Ua maalo ae la ka Moi Li Yuan o ka moo alii o Tang ma ke kumu o ka puu kanu laau ma ke kumu o ka mauna o Lintong. Ua hoʻopuni ʻia ʻo Li Yuan a he koʻikoʻi loa ia.
I kēia manawa, kokoke e hiamoe ʻo Shubao ma ka luakini ʻo Wuyuan, ua pūʻiwa ʻo ia i kona lohe koke ʻana i ka leo o nā kāne a me nā lio e ʻuā ana no ka make ma waho o ka luakini. Kau koke ʻo ia i kona lio a holo i waenakonu o ka mauna, he uahi a me ka lepo ma lalo o ke kuahiwi, a ua hoʻōho pepehi ʻia.
Me ka wikiwiki o ka uila, ua holo wikiwiki ʻo Shu Bao a pepehi i nā kānaka he nui i ka lālani.
Hoʻopakele i ka ʻohana o Li Yuan. ʻO ia hoʻi, ua hoʻohana hou ʻia ʻo ia e ke aliʻi o Tang Dynasty. Ua lilo ʻo ia i meʻe hoʻokumu o ka mōʻī Tang.
聖意: He pomaikai ka home ohana nona iho, imi waiwai, pau ka hana, pau ka mare ana, hiki mai na kanaka hele wawae i ke kula, moa ka enuhe silika, a pomaikai na holoholona eono, imi kanaka, hoopuehu ka hihia. , maikaʻi ka neʻe ʻana, loaʻa ka waiwai nalowale, palekana ka maʻi, maikaʻi ka lua kupapaʻu mauna, a ʻo ka laki maikaʻi.
